title: I Write Trends Not Tragedies 1/21: Louie Anderson, Meatloaf, Adele, Bill Hader, Jon Voight, Tom Hanks, Peloton
itunes:title: I Write Trends Not Tragedies 1/21: Louie Anderson, Meatloaf, Adele, Bill Hader, Jon Voight, Tom Hanks, Peloton
description:
In this edition of I Write Trends Not Tragedies, Jack and Miles discuss the passing of Louis Anderson AND Meatloaf, Adele postponing her entire Las Vegas residency, Bill Hader and Anna Kendrick secretly dating, Jon Voight likening Trump to Lincoln, the Tom Hanks\Biden video, and Peloton halting production of its bikes/treadmills.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
